contentList.content: Alchemist

Grants you the benefits of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExperimentalAlchemy">Experimental Alchemy</LSTag> and once per turn you can throw a grenade or water bottle without consuming an <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and healing potions using only a <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

Grants you the benefits of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExperimentalAlchemy">Experimental Alchemy</LSTag> and once per turn you can throw grenade or water bottle without consuming an <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and healing potions using only a <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Alchemy Throw
Throw a grenade or water bottle.
Throw a healing potion.
Deadly Alacrity

Increase an ability other than <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by 1. The number you need to roll for a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by 1. When you hit a target with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> you regain 1m/3ft of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement</LSTag>, if you <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critically Hit</LSTag> or strike a killing blow regain 3m/10ft instead.

The number you need to roll for a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by 1. When you hit a target with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> you regain [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement</LSTag>, if you <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critically Hit</LSTag> or strike a killing blow regain [2] instead.
Eldritch Adept

You learn one Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. Increase either <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 1.
Select an eldritch invocation to receive.
Fighting Initiate
You may choose to learn one fighting style from the Fighter class. Increase either <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 1.
Fey Touched

Increase either Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma by 1, learn Misty Step and choose a level 1 divination or enchantment spell.

Both Misty Step and the selected spell can be cast without consuming a Spell Slot once per Short Rest.

You increased either <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 1, learned <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MistyStep">Misty Step</LSTag> and chose a level 1 divination or enchantment spell.
Heaven Touched

Increase either Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma by 1, learn Sanctuary and choose a level 1 abjuration or transmutation spell.

Both Sanctuary and the selected spell can be cast without consuming a Spell Slot once per Short Rest.

You increased either <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 1, learned <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Sanctuary">Sanctuary</LSTag> and chose a level 1 abjuration or transmutation spell.
Hell Touched

Increase either Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma by 1, learn Hellish Rebuke and choose a harmful level 1 conjuration or evocation spell.

Both Hellish Rebuke and the selected spell can be cast without consuming a Spell Slot once per Short Rest.

You increased either <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 1, learned <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_HellishRebuke">Hellish Rebuke</LSTag> and chose a harmful level 1 conjuration or evocation spell.
Light Armor Master

When wearing Light Armor, gain +3m/10ft <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>, +3m/10ft <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump Distance</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reactions</LSTag> against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

When wearing Light Armor, gain +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>, +[2] <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump Distance</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reactions</LSTag> against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Metamagic Adept

Gain two metamagic options and three <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag>. Increase either <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 1.
You have gained two metamagic options and three <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag>.
Metamagic
Select metamagic variants to learn.
Advanced Metamagic
Select an advanced metamagic variant to learn.
Nimble Fingers

Increase your Dexterity by 1 and gain Expertise in Sleight Of Hand.

You can use a reaction to deflect a projectile aimed at you, reducing its damage and send it back to the attacker.

Your Dexterity is increased by 1 and you gained Expertise in Sleight Of Hand.

You can use a reaction to deflect a projectile aimed at you, reducing its damage and send it back to the attacker.
Reduce the damage from a ranged weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
Return Missile
Shadow Touched

Increase either Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma by 1, learn Invisibility and can choose a level 1 or 2 illusion or necromancy spell.

Both Invisibility and the selected spell can be cast without consuming a Spell Slot once per Short Rest. Level 1 spells acquired this way will be cast at spell level 2.

You increased either <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 1, learned <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Invisibility">Invisibility</LSTag> and chose a level 1 or 2 illusion or necromancy spell.
Skill Expert
Become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in one skill, gain <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in another and increase an ability by 1.
You have become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in one skill, gained <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in another and increased an ability by 1.
Expertise

Select a skill to gain <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in, adding twice your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>.
Proficiency

Select a skill to gain Proficiency in, adding your
Proficiency Bonus to Skill Checks.
Thief's Apprentice

Grants Cunning Action: Hide. When attacking from Hiding or Invisibility or after scoring a killing blow you gain an additional bonus action on your next turn.

This does not function if you already have an additional bonus action from another source.

Grants Cunning Action: Hide. When attacking from Hiding or Invisibility or after scoring a killing blow you gain an additional bonus action on your next turn.

This does not function if you already have an additional bonus action from another source.
Thief's Apprentice: Fast Hands
You will be granted an additional <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> next turn.
You have been granted an additional <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Telekinetic

Increase either <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 1. You learn the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MageHand">Mage Hand</LSTag> cantrip and learn to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Target_Telekinetic_Push">telekinetically shove</LSTag> a creature.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increased by 1, you learned the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MageHand">Mage Hand</LSTag> cantrip and can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Target_Telekinetic_Push">telekinetically shove</LSTag> creatures.
Telekinetic Shove
Shove a creature telekinetically. Shove distance is based on your proficiency bonus, currently [1]m.
War Magic

After casting a spell or cantrip you can make a basic attack as a bonus action. This attack deals half damage.

Starting at level 5 you can make any attack as extra attack and it deals full damage.
Can make a basic attack using a <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Can make an extra attack using a <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.

After casting a spell or cantrip you can make a basic attack as a bonus action. This attack deals half damage.

Starting at level 5 it deals full damage and you are no longer limited to basic attacks.
Gain <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in this skill.
